content:
The best industry chatbots include graceful solutions to error handling. Einstein Bots has many features to ensure data quality without creating frustration.

The human brain self-corrects. For example, when we forget to include the @ symbol in an email address, our brain recognizes that something is wrong and seeks a solution. Conversely, the bot relies on features to get the correct information, or rules to determine when it's the best time to hand off to an agent.

Sometimes it can be a challenge to teach our bot to be so agile, but Einstein Bots offer a number of ways to get there. Plan to make generous use of the following when building your bot, to ensure your customers have a great conversation:

Conversation Repair: This feature handles recognition errors, or when the bot doesnâ€™t understand the input that it received.
Validation: This feature helps the bot stay away from contextual errors.
Error Rules: This method covers potential system errors in a Flow or an Apex error. It guides the bot to a graceful solution.

Maintain Chatbot Conversation Quality with these features to ensure your customers have a great conversation.
title: Maintaining Quality in Chatbot Conversations
